Vision¶

Manipulate, scrape, and analyze visual media

Color¶

color_delta(color1, color2)

Percentage difference between two colors

get_colors(image_path[, color_count])

Get predominant color(s) in a given image

Image¶

download(url, filename)

Download an image or video from a URL

draw_points_on_image(image_path, point_list)

Draw points on an image

write_points_to_disk(filename, input_list)

Write a list of points in form (x, y) to disk

get_points_from_disk(filename)

Get a list of points in form (x, y) from saved file

create_collage(width, height, min_size, …)

Create a collage from a list of images

Face¶

crop_faces(image_path)

Crop and save all faces within a given image

crop_eyes(image_path)

Crop and save all eyes within a given image

face_match(known_image_path, unknown_image_path)

Find matched faces in an image or list of images

get_landmarks(image_path)

Get coordinates of 68 facial landmarks from a given image

get_5_landmarks(image_path)

Get coordinates 5 facial landmarks from a given image

write_landmarks_database(folder[, delete_errors])

Go through all images in a folder and create text files with their 68 facial feature points

average_faces(directory_path, output_filepath)

cloudburst
